articles.title: What to Know About the JUICE Mission to Jupiter and Its Frozen Moons - Gizmodo

articles.content: More than a decade after the mission was announced, JUICE is finally ready for its much-anticipated journey to Jupiter. Packed with 10 instruments, its one of the most advanced probes ever sent to th… [+615 chars]
